commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Nine contests between μ's and Nijigasaki! If you win, I'll show you the key to our charm!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: S-Seriously?!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: A contest? Do we have to fight or something?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: You can do it if you really want to know more about us, right?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (A contest against μ's? That's a lot of pressure. But if we win, we can find out the secret to their charm.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (I want to know more about μ's.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Nico, I accept your challenge!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Ack, that kind of just slipped out after I worked myself up thinking about it.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Welcome back! You sure look tired.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: How was the interview with μ's? Tell us what you learned about them.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Everyone...

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Are you okay? You seem a little off.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Actually, I have something I need to tell you.

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Nine contests?!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Ugh, yeah... Sorry. I should have talked with all of you about it before making my decision.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I can't believe you went over there as a μ's fan representative and ended up being challenged to a contest by them.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I'm not sure how I feel about going up against μ's.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: But if we win, we'll get our hands on the Secret Idol Handbook! This is a huge chance for us!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah, Nozomi said the secret to them getting so big was written in it.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Then we'll get really big if we read it too, right?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: A contest with μ's... How nerve-racking.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Did the interviews go all right?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah. I got to see them writing songs and having practice lessons and stuff.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Was their practice way more intense than ours?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Of course it was. I heard they practice for eight hours every morning.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Are there that many hours in the morning?!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I hate practice in the morning.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I didn't see their morning practice, but μ's seemed to have fun with their club, and were very passionate about their practice.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: It all seemed so normal though. It kind of made me think about whether or not this is how they really make their concerts so amazing.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: That means there has to be something they couldn't show us! Classified information!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I don't think so. They showed me everything they could, and were really nice about it.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: So all that's left is to see what's in that Secret Idol Handbook, huh?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I guess we have to do the nine contests.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: This is a losing battle.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: H-Hey, we haven't lost yet!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Plus, if we don't take this opportunity, we'd never get to have a contest with μ's.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I'm so excited to meet μ's! Rina-chan Board says, "Woo-hoo!"

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: But meeting them for the first time in a contest? That makes me nervous.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: It should be fine. I love stuff like this!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: By the way, what kind of contest are we going to have, exactly?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Is there anything where we'd actually stand a chance against μ's?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I won't lose a napping contest. *Yawn*

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Snap out of it.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Nico said she would decide what the nine contests would be.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: If there's nine, that means each one of us will have to compete.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Everyone, can you do it?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: No problem! Each and everyone one of us will go out there representing Nijigasaki!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Everyone, thank you so much! Let's do our best!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Yeah!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: I never thought we'd have a contest against them.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: *Giggle* It'll be fun!

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Can't we just all meet up and chat?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Nope. I need to see just how serious the Nijigasaki idols are.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: I'm looking forward to it. I bet it will make our two schools much closer.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Yeah, there's a special bond born from competition.

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: You're looking forward to it, right Rin?

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Yep! I can't wait to play!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: I want to hear one of Nijigasaki's songs someday.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: If we're going to do this, better take it seriously!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Yeah!
